GDevelop is an open-source game creator,: GDevelop és un creador de jocs de codi obert, dissenyat per a la creació de jocs ràpida i intuïtiva.
This website in your language: Aquest lloc web esta en el teu idioma
Use JavaScript with the game engine: Utilitza JavaScript amb el motor del joc
GDevelop for Game jams: GDevelop per a embussos de jocs
Publish your web game on Poki: Publish your web game on Poki
GDevelop was created with love by: GDevelop va ser creat amb amor per
who added features, fixed bugs, sent new: Qui va afegir funcions, arreglant errors, enviar nous exemples, escriure tutorials, i ajudant la comunitat.
BUB is a very special, one of a kind cri: BUB és molt especial, és molt amable. Més concretament, ella és la [gata més sorprenent del planeta](http://lilbub.com)... i el seu joc es fa amb GDevelop!
The game is a retro 8-bit game, with bea: El joc es un joc retro de 8 bits, amb belles arts i banda sonora, que alterna entre nivells de plataformes, amb secrets ocults, i nivells de tirador amb caps, múltiples enemics i bonificacions.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights és un sucós joc de combat amb jet, en el qual explotaràs, esquivaràs i tallarà el teu camí a través de masses d'enemics tecnològicament inferiors.
As your intergalactic intervention missi: A mesura que avanci la vostra missió d'intervenció intergalàctica, el vostre hyper-jet adaptatiu evolucionarà cap a una cosa més forta i extranya en recollir alguns dels centenars d'elements disponibles en el joc.
Imagine and publish your games with GDev: Imagineu i publiqueu els vostres jocs amb GDevelop. Paquetatge amb tutorials i exemples.
Add ads to your game with AdMob: Afegiu anuncis al joc amb AdMob
Use AdMob in your GDevelop games to disp: Utilitzeu AdMob als jocs de GDevelop per mostrar anuncis i premiar videos als vostres jugadors
Go to [AdMob website](https://www.google: Go to [AdMob website](https://www.google.com/admob/) and create an account. Then, create a new app from the AdMob interface and an ad unit. Note the identifiers for both the app and the ad unit, as they will be used in your game.
In GDevelop, open the properties of your: In GDevelop, open the properties of your game and paste the AdMob **app id**. This acts as the identification that allows AdMob to serve ads in your app.
3) Trigger ads display from events: 3) Els anuncis de disparador es mostren en els esdeveniments
Add events in your game to load and show: Add events in your game to load and show the ad when needed (this can be when a level is successfully completed for example). Paste the ad unit identifier into the parameters of the action. You can also enter "test" for loading a test ad.
4) Publish your game on Android: 4) Publica el teu joc a Android
You can test and publish your game on An: Podeu provar i publicar el vostre joc a Android directament des de GDevelop. En l'editor, obriu el joc i després la finestra Exporta. Escolliu Android, feu clic a Exporta i espereu uns minuts.
How to publish to Android in one click: Com publicar a Android en un clic
The blog of the GDevelop team, contribut: The blog of the GDevelop team, contributors and community.
Contribute to GDevelop - Open-source HTM: Contribuïu a GDevelop - Open source HTML5 game making tool
GDevelop is an open-source project (even: GDevelop és un projecte de codi obert (inclus en aquest lloc web): qualsevol pot aportar i millorar el programari!
There are multiple ways you can contribu: Hi ha diverses maneres de contribuir a GDevelop, depenent del teu temps, les teves habilitats i el que t'interesi.
GDevelop and the website can be translat: GDevelop i el lloc web es poden traduir al vostre idioma! Les traduccions es fan a un lloc web on tothom s'hi pot implicar.
It's easy to get the source code of GDev: És fàcil obtenir el codi font de GDevelop i començar a millorar les coses!
Edit the website on GitHub: Edita el lloc web a GitHub
The forum and the Discord chat are the p: El fòrum i el xat de Discord són el lloc ideal per a obtenir i proporcionar ajuda a altres usuaris de GDevelop!
Go to the community forum: Vés al fòrum de la comunitat
Follow GDevelop on Facebook and Twitter:: Seguiu GDevelop a Facebook i Twitter:
For most beginners and even advanced use: Per a la majoria d'iniciats i fins i tot avançats, els tutorials i la pàgina d'ajuda són els recursos més valuosos per crear jocs fantàstics ràpidament. Al wiki, podeu escriure tutorials o millorar els ja existents.
Create custom behaviors for your game ob: Creeu comportaments personalitzats per als objectes del vostre joc a GDevelop
In a few clicks, you can create new beha: En pocs clics, pots crear nous comportaments per als objectes del joc - mitjançant esdeveniments o JavaScript.
Flash is a custom behavior that is creat: Flash és un comportament personalitzat que es crea directament a partir de GDevelop - permetent que un objecte parpallegi
Create custom behaviors - directly from: Creeu comportaments personalitzats - directament des de l'editor GDevelop
GDevelop allows you to create new behavi: GDevelop et permet crear nous comportaments, mitjançant els mateixos esdeveniments que els que estas utilitzant per crear les regles del teu joc.
Want enemies to automatically follow the: Voleu que els enemics segueixin automàticament el jugador?
Want some rockets to target the player?: Voleu uns coets per apuntar al jugador?
Want enemies and the players to have hea: Voleu que els enemics i els jugadors tinguin salut i facin mal?
Behaviors can be created for any kind of: Es poden crear comportaments per a qualsevol tipus d'objecte, i podeu crear accions i condicions personalitzades associades al vostre nou comportament.
An action is exposed by the behavior, an: Una acció està exposada pel comportament i es pot utilitzar com qualsevol altra acció en els esdeveniments
Read the documentation about custom beha: Llegiu la documentació sobre comportaments personalitzats
Import new behaviors, created by the GDe: Importeu nous comportaments, creats per la comunitat GDevelop
Behaviors, as well as extensions, can be: Els comportaments, així com les extensions, es poden compartir entre projectes. Podeu ** exportar-les i importar-les en pocs clics. Si el vostre comportament és genèric i reutilitzable en diversos jocs, fins i tot podeu enviar-lo perquè s'integri a la llista creixent de comportaments personalitzats compartits per la comunitat.
Create your game by assembling behaviors: Creeu el vostre joc tot muntant conductes
Progressively create custom behaviors fo: Crea progressivament comportaments personalitzats per a objectes del joc
ideal for large games and keeping simple: ideal per a grans jocs i per celebrar esdeveniments senzills.
Learn more about extensions: Obteniu més informació sobre les extensions
Search for new behaviors in the list of: Cerqueu nous comportaments a la llista de conductes compartides per la comunitat
Download GDevelop or try it online - cre: Descarregueu GDevelop o proveu-lo en línia: creeu jocs sense programació
GDevelop is free and can be used for pro: GDevelop és gratuït i es pot utilitzar per a guanys de lucre o sense ànim de lucre.
GDevelop runs on Windows, macOS and most: GDevelop funciona amb Windows, macOS i les distribucions més recents de Linux. També podeu provar-ho en línia mitjançant Chrome, Firefox o un altre navegador web recent.
This is an [AppImage](https://appimage.o: This is an [AppImage](https://appimage.org/). **Make it executable first** and run it. For example: `chmod a+x GDevelop*.AppImage && ./GDevelop*.AppImage`.
You can also [download GDevelop as a tor: You can also [download GDevelop as a torrent](https://fosstorrents.com/games/gdevelop/). Thanks to fosstorrents.com for managing these torrents.
Wonder what's new in latest versions? Fi: Et preguntes què hi ha de nou en les darreres versions? Cerqueu les notes de llançament a l'aplicació o [en línia] (https://github.com/4ian/GDevelop/releases).
To create your first game, start by read: To create your first game, start by reading or watching a tutorial:
GDevelop is an open-source project. You: GDevelop és un projecte de codi obert. Et pots implicar en la comunitat per millorar-lo.
Gdevelop 4 can still be downloaded. GDev: Encara es pot descarregar Gdevelop 4. GDevelop 5 es recomana per a qualsevol usuari nou, ja que GDevelop 4 no s'actualitzarà. En el futur no es proporcionarà cap assistència per a GDevelop 4: recomanem a qualsevol usuari de GDevelop 4 que actualitzi a GDevelop 5
GDevelop 4 is old and not supported anym: GDevelop 4 is old and not supported anymore. We recommend switching to GDevelop 5, which is compatible with most GDevelop 4 games, has many new features and an improvement user interface.
GDevelop for the education - Teach game: GDevelop for the education - Ensenyar creació de jocs
Using GDevelop in classroom is a perfect: L’ús de GDevelop a l’aula és una oportunitat perfecta per ensenyar a programar, fer jocs i desencadenar la creativitat dels estudiants.
GDevelop has already been used in classr: GDevelop ja s'ha utilitzat en aules i cursos en línia, amb estudiants de mitjans digitals o nens de primer grau.
Please send us your photos and tweets if: Envieu-nos les vostres fotos i tuits si feu servir GDevelop per a un curs.
Install new extensions in GDevelop and s: Instal·leu noves extensions a GDevelop i compartiu-ne la vostra
Search and add new features to your game: Busqueu i afegiu noves funcions al vostre joc en pocs clics.
Search in the library of extensions, rea: Cerqueu a la biblioteca d’extensions a punt per instal·lar-les amb un sol clic
Directly from the editor, you can explor: Directament des de l'editor, podeu explorar la biblioteca en línia ** d'extensions ** (també anomenada "administrador de paquets" o "botiga d'extensions"). Les extensions poden comportar * comportaments nous * per als objectes del joc o * accions, condicions * o expressions que estiguin llestes per utilitzar en esdeveniments.
**Featured extensions** are peer reviewe: ** Les extensions destacades ** es revisen per igual. Són ideals per afegir noves funcions a un ritme ràpid al vostre joc, fent que tant el prototipat de jocs nous sigui un procés molt ràpid i permetin construir jocs més grans muntant extensions.
Read how to install extensions: Llegiu la secció per instal·lar extensions
Learn about creating custom behaviors: Obteniu més informació sobre com crear conductes personalitzades
Export your own extensions and share the: Exporteu les vostres pròpies extensions i compartiu-les
All extensions can be exported to a file: Totes les extensions es poden exportar a un fitxer. Es poden compartir i integrar fàcilment amb un altre projecte. Millor, si heu creat una extensió útil, podeu enviar-la per integrar-la a la biblioteca de [extensions de codi obert, de comunitat] (https://github.com/4ian/GDevelop-extensions).
As extensions are constructed using the: Com que les extensions es construeixen amb els fulls d’esdeveniments intuïtius de GDevelop, es poden composar d’esdeveniments, [JavaScript o una combinació d’ambdós] (/ javascript-game-engine).
Extensions can provide new behaviors tha: Les extensions poden proporcionar nous comportaments que es poden afegir als objectes del vostre joc.
Make Facebook Instant Games with GDevelo: Les extensions poden arribar a comportar-nos que es poden afegir als objectes del vostre joc.
Make games for Facebook Messenger: Feu jocs per a Facebook Messenger
With GDevelop, you can export your game: Amb GDevelop, podeu exportar el vostre joc com a joc instantani de Facebook en dos clics.
1) Create your app on Facebook Developer: 1) Creeu la vostra aplicació a Facebook Developers
First thing, make sure to have an accoun: El primer fet, assegureu-vos de tenir un compte a ** Facebook Developers **. Creeu una aplicació i configureu-la per escollir "Jocs" com a categoria i habiliteu Instant Games in Products:
2) Open GDevelop and export for Facebook: 2) Obriu GDevelop i exporteu-los per a Facebook Instant Games
In GDevelop, open your game and then the: A GDevelop, obriu el joc i després la finestra Exporta. Trieu ** Facebook Instant Games **, feu clic a Exporta i espereu uns segons.
Go back to your game page on Facebook De: Torneu a la pàgina de joc a Facebook Developers, trieu Web Hosting al menú i ** pengeu el fitxer ** exportat per GDevelop.
You can also add testers to let your fri: També podeu afegir provadors per permetre als vostres amics provar el vostre joc.
More about uploading your game: Més informació sobre la càrrega del joc
4) Try your game on Messenger: 4) Prova el teu joc a Messenger
Now, get your phone and **open messenger: Ara, obteniu el telèfon i ** obriu el missatger **. Obriu una conversa, trieu Jocs i feu clic a la icona del vostre joc per començar a jugar-hi.
5) Use Instant Games features and publis: 5) Utilitzeu les funcions de jocs instantanis i publiqueu el vostre joc.
GDevelop gave you access to Instant Game: GDevelop us permet accedir a funcions específiques de Instant Games, com el nom del reproductor, per integrar millor el joc en les converses de Messenger.
When your game is ready, submit it for r: Quan el vostre joc estigui a punt, envieu-lo a Facebook per revisar-lo perquè es faci ** disponible a tot el món **.
Read the full step-by-step tutorial: Llegiu el tutorial complet pas a pas
Features of GDevelop - create any kind o: Característiques de GDevelop: crea qualsevol tipus de jocs sense codificar
GDevelop is bundled with dozens of featu: GDevelop s'ofereix amb desenes de funcions per imaginar i crear qualsevol tipus de jocs.
Deploy your game everywhere: Desplega el teu joc a tot arreu
One click export to [Facebook Instant Ga: Un clic per exportar a [Facebook Instant Games] (/ facebook-instant-games), per jugar a Messenger.
Export your game [for the web](http://wi: Exporteu el vostre joc [per a la web] (http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/publishing/web) en un sol clic
Export as a stand-alone executable game: Exporta com a joc executable autònom per a Windows, macOS i Linux
Publish your game on [Poki](/poki), Kong: Publish your game on [Poki](/poki), Kongregate, Itch.io and other gaming websites!
Display [ads and reward videos](/ads-in-: Visualitzeu [anuncis i vídeos recompensats] (/ ads-in-your-game-with-admob) als vostres jugadors mitjançant [AdMob] (/ ads-in-your-game-with-admob).
Create explosions, fire and impressive e: Creeu explosions, incendis i efectes impressionants amb ** Emissors de partícules **
**\"9 patch\"** sprites, perfect for pla: ** "9 patch" ** sprites, perfectes per a plataformes
**Tiled sprites**, to create mosaics, fl: ** Tiled sprites **, per crear mosaics, terres i patrons de repetició
Formatted rich text with **BB Text** obj: Formatted rich text with **BB Text** objects
Draw custom shapes on screen with **Shap: Dibuixa formes personalitzades a la pantalla amb ** Shape Painters **
Author maps of your tile-based game in T: Author maps of your tile-based game in Tiled and import them in a **Tilemap** object
Support for custom collision masks: Suport a les màscares de col·lisió personalitzats
Read the documentation for all objects: Llegiu la documentació de tots els objectes
Dozens of visual effects are bundled wit: Dozens of visual effects are bundled with GDevelop
Blur, Noise, CRT effect, Color Map, Chro: Blur, Noise, CRT effect, Color Map, Chromatic Aberration, Glow, Shadows...
Add your own effects by [creating new ex: Add your own effects by [creating new extensions for the game engine](/javascript-game-engine).
Learn how to use effects in GDevelop: Learn how to use effects in GDevelop
Add behaviors to your game objects: Afegiu comportaments als objectes del vostre joc
Add realistic behavior to your objects: Afegiu un comportament realista als vostres objectes
Have your objects move and avoiding obst: Feu que els vostres objectes es moguin i eviti obstacles
create platformer games in a breeze: crear jocs de plataformes a poc a poc
quickly make your objects draggable with: feu que els objectes es puguin arrossegar ràpidament amb el ratolí / tacte
support multiple screen sizes by ensurin: suporta diverses mides de pantalla garantint que els controls es mantenen en la posició correcta
smoothly animate object positions, sizes: Animeu les posicions, les mides, l’opacitat i els colors de l’objecte
And more, to automate current tasks and: I més, per automatitzar les tasques actuals i comportaments en un parell de clics!
Dozens of additional behaviors are avail: Dozens of additional behaviors are available throught community extensions, which can be discovered and imported in one click directly from the GDevelop editor.
Read the documentation for all behaviors: Llegiu la documentació de totes les conductes
Create your own custom behaviors: Creeu els vostres propis comportaments personalitzats
Make desktop & mobile-ready games: Feu jocs per a ordinadors i mòbils
Save player data in the browser storage: Deseu les dades del reproductor a l'emmagatzematge del navegador o als seus dispositius
Full support for sound effects and music: Suport complet per a efectes de so i músiques
Support for touchscreens & multi-touch: Suport per a pantalles tàctils i multi-touch
The scene editor lets you visually edit: L’editor d’escenes us permet editar visualment els vostres nivells
Add interfaces and create parallax effec: Afegiu interfícies i creeu efectes de paralaxi
Create your levels dynamically with exte: Creeu els vostres nivells de manera dinàmica amb dissenys externs
Design your assets with [Piskel](/make-8: Dissenyeu els vostres recursos amb [Piskel] (/ make-8bit-pixelart-games)
a powerful pixel art and sprite editor: un potent editor de píxels i sprite
Generate [sound effects with Jfxr](/game: Genereu [efectes de so amb Jfxr] (/ game-jams)
create effects and customize them in a f: crear efectes i personalitzar-los en pocs clics
Inspect the content of your game and mak: Inspeccioneu el contingut del joc i feu canvis dinàmics mentre previsualitzeu el joc
[monitor the resource expensive spots](h: [controlar els llocs costosos del recurs] (http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/interface/debugger/profile-your-game) al joc
Super fast development with Live Preview: Super fast development with Live Preview
When editing your game in the editor, ju: When editing your game in the editor, just press a single button to **apply your changes to the running game**.
It's a great way to tweak your game, bui: It's a great way to tweak your game, build your levels or test the gameplay without having to restart from scratch after every changes, helping you stay focused.
Preview your games **on other devices (p: Preview your games **on other devices (phone, tablets, other computers)** using the *Network Preview* - without having to export them. Useful to quickly validate the gameplay on smaller devices, verify the game performance and playtest the game with testers.
Even better, it's compatible with Live P: Even better, it's compatible with Live Preview: do changes in the editor and they will be applied to the game run on your external devices or browsers.
Learn more about Live Preview and Networ: Learn more about Live Preview and Network Preview
Build ambitious games with advanced feat: Construir jocs ambiciosos amb funcions avançades
Communicate with external websites or se: Comunicar-se amb llocs web o serveis externs mitjançant sol·licituds HTTP.
Feu servir esdeveniments avançats: bucles, per a cadascun ...
Create reusable **functions** using even: Creeu funcions ** reutilitzables ** mitjançant esdeveniments que es poden utilitzar com a accions, condicions o expressions del vostre joc
a powerful feature never seen in other g: una potent característica mai vista en altres eines de creació de jocs.
Manipulate variables with arbitrary comp: Manipular variables amb estructures complexes arbitràries, amb suport per llegir / escriure JSON.
You can [use JavaScript to code](/javasc: Podeu [utilitzar JavaScript per codificar] (/ javascript-game-engine) parts del vostre joc
use it for a few functions, to write ext: utilitzeu-lo per a algunes funcions, per escriure extensions o la majoria del vostre joc.
Display ads in your game with [AdMob](/a: Mostra anuncis al joc amb [AdMob] (/ ads-in-your-game-with-admob) o enllaça a productes de la vostra botiga [Shopify] (http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/ totes les funcions / fer botiga).
Search and [install new features with ex: Cerqueu i instal·leu funcions noves amb extensions] (/ extensions i compartides), construïdes per la comunitat
get new, ready to use features for your: obtindreu funcions noves i llestes per utilitzar el joc en pocs clics
All editors of GDevelop - make platforme: Tots els editors de GDevelop: jocs de plataformes, tiradors, rpg, jocs d'acció...
The interface of GDevelop is made of int: La interfície de GDevelop està formada per editors intuïtius per dissenyar els teus propis jocs des de zero.
See how to use GDevelop to add a trigger: Vegeu com utilitzar GDevelop per afegir un disparador al joc en 90 segons
Design your own levels with the scene ed: Dissenya els teus propis nivells amb l’editor d’escenes: pots triar objectes, posar-los en escena, ajustar la seva posició i mida. Podeu dissenyar els vostres nivells completament amb l'editor d'escenes. Si voleu crear nivells o interfícies complexes, els dissenys externs us permeten crear parts d’un nivell i reutilitzar-les en altres escenes.
Get started in 2 minutes: Try GDevelop i: Comença en 2 minuts: prova GDevelop al navegador
Imagining and creating the rules of your: Imaginar i crear les regles del joc no implica aprendre la sintaxi d’un llenguatge de programació complex. L’editor d’esdeveniments mostra un full d’esdeveniments: cada esdeveniment es compon de condicions i accions. Quan es compleixen les condicions, s’executen accions. És tan senzill.
All conditions and actions are available: Totes les condicions i accions estan disponibles en una llista perquè pugueu descobrir i trobar fàcilment què voleu fer de les regles del vostre joc.
Learn more about events in the tutorials: Obteniu més informació sobre els esdeveniments dels tutorials
Create platformer games with GDevelop: Creeu jocs de plataformes amb GDevelop
Develop space shooter games with GDevelo: Desenvolupar jocs de trets espacials amb GDevelop
Create mario-like games with GDevelop: Creeu jocs similars a mario amb GDevelop
Everything that is displayed on the scre: Tot el que es mostra a la pantalla del joc és un objecte. La majoria dels objectes s’anomenen sprites: es compon d’animacions i es poden utilitzar per a qualsevol element animat. Per exemple, el vostre jugador, enemics o bonificacions per escollir.
Other object are also available to creat: També hi ha disponibles altres objectes per crear interfícies o afegir efectes al joc: textos, partícules, sprites de rajoles ...
Discover all the objects available in GD: Descobriu tots els objectes disponibles a GDevelop
Resources editor, sprite editor and soun: Editor de recursos, editor de sprite i generador d'efectes de so
All the images and audio files used in y: Totes les imatges i fitxers d’àudio utilitzats al joc es mostren a l’Editor de recursos. És una manera senzilla de gestionar els actius del vostre joc.
GDevelop comes bundled with free assets: GDevelop inclou recursos gratuïts per començar! Per prototipsar ràpidament i crear els seus propis actius, GDevelop també s’ofereix amb un potent editor d’art de píxels anomenat Piskel. També podeu crear un efecte de so amb un sol clic mitjançant el generador de so integrat. És perfecte per a [jamams] (/ game-jams /).
Learn everything about the editors in th: Obteniu més informació sobre els editors de la documentació
Examples of GDevelop - make platformer,: Exemples de GDevelop: joc de plataformes, tiradors, rpg, jocs d'acció ...
GDevelop is bundled with 120+ examples a: GDevelop is bundled with 120+ examples and starters to get you quickly started, learn or try a specific feature.
These are the examples bundled with GDev: Aquests són els exemples inclosos amb GDevelop. Curiós? Podeu obrir-les i provar-les directament des del vostre navegador. GDevelop és ràpid per començar i jugarà amb els exemples en pocs segons.
Learn step-by-step how to use GDevelop o: Obteniu informació sobre com utilitzar GDevelop o obtenir ajuda sobre una característica específica: el wiki ofereix tutorials per a principiants i una documentació completa per al programari.
Create a tank shooter game: Crea un joc de trets de tancs
Make games for Game jams: Feu jocs per als embussos de joc
GDevelop is a perfect fit for quickly ma: GDevelop és perfecte per realitzar jocs ràpids durant els embussos.
Make your assets with Piskel: Fes el teu patrimoni amb Piskel
GDevelop is bundled with **Piskel**, a s: GDevelop està inclòs amb ** Piskel **, un editor de sprite que és perfecte per dibuixar els seus sprites ràpidament i per a píxels.
Read more about making 8-bit and pixelar: Més informació sobre com fer jocs de 8 bits i píxelart
Generate sounds effects in one click: Genereu efectes de so en un sol clic
GDevelop has an integrated sound effect: GDevelop compta amb un generador d'efectes de so integrat, ** Jfxr **. Podeu crear efectes sonors com explosions, salts, monedes, accions energètiques amb un sol clic i personalitzar-los com vulgueu.
Read about all features available in GDe: Obteniu més informació sobre totes les funcions disponibles a GDevelop
Want to create a retro platformer game?: Voleu crear un joc de plataforma retro? GDevelop té uns comportaments predefinits que podeu afegir al vostre personatge i a les vostres plataformes. En pocs segons, tindreu en funcionament un joc bàsic de plataforma i a punt per ser personalitzat i millorat. També es poden utilitzar altres comportaments, condicions i accions per crear qualsevol tipus de jocs en 2D: shmup, "Bullet Hell", jocs d'arcade ...
Learn more about behaviors: Obteniu més informació sobre les conductes
GDevelop for Game studios, indies and Ed: GDevelop per a jocs, indies i educació
GDevelop is a fast and flexible game eng: GDevelop és un motor de joc ràpid i flexible que es pot utilitzar per a casos d'ús diferents.
GDevelop is a lightweight game engine, c: GDevelop is a lightweight game engine, carefully designed and open-source. The unique design of the editor has been explained during [talks in international conferences](PLACEHOLDER_LINK_DO_NOT_TRANSLATE).
MIT license: extend and contribute to th: Llicència MIT: ampliar i contribuir al codi font del motor
Adaptable editor based on JavaScript, Re: Editor adaptable basat en JavaScript, React.js i WebAssemblea
Integrate GDevelop in your team, use eve: Integra GDevelop al teu equip, utilitza esdeveniments o JavaScript segons les teves necessitats
Get game designers, artists and develope: Aconsegueix que els dissenyadors, artistes i desenvolupadors de jocs treballin en el mateix entorn
Game projects are human readable and sup: Els projectes de jocs són llegibles per humans i permeten sistemes de control de versions com Git o Mercurial
Companies can provide commercial or free: Companies can provide commercial or free support for GDevelop:

Accessible and easy to learn, GDevelop i: Accessible i fàcil d’aprendre, GDevelop és ideal per a desenvolupadors de jocs indie. Podreu iniciar un joc i iterar-lo ràpidament mitjançant esdeveniments, comportaments i noves extensions.
Free to use: download GDevelop and start: Gratuït d'utilitzar: descarregueu GDevelop i comenceu a fer un joc avui
Integrated editors allowing to make game: Editors integrats que permeten fer actius de joc directament des de GDevelop
Super fast prototyping with open-source: Prototips súper ràpids amb extensions i comportaments de comunitat oberta
Custom behaviors make your game logic re: Els comportaments personalitzats fan que la vostra lògica del joc sigui reutilitzable i compartible
GDevelop for game jams: GDevelop per a embussos de jocs
Teaching game creation or programming to: Ensenyar a crear jocs o programar a nens o estudiants? GDevelop ha estat utilitzat per desenes d’escoles, universitats i programes d’arrencada per a totes les edats.
Learn more about GDevelop and education: Obteniu més informació sobre el desenvolupament de serveis i l'Administració

Make games with a fast, intuitive game e: Make games with a fast, intuitive game engine
Showcase of the games created with GDeve: Aparador dels jocs creats amb GDevelop
Here are a few games created with GDevel: A continuació, es detallen alguns jocs creats amb GDevelop. El següent ha de ser teu!
Made a nice game with GDevelop?: Va fer un bon joc amb GDevelop?
We'll love to know about your game and a: Ens encantarà conèixer el vostre joc i afegir-lo aquí. Assegureu-vos que disposeu de boniques captures de pantalla preparades i que el joc sigui d’alta qualitat :)
Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created wit: Hyperspace Dogfights, un joc creat amb GDevelop
A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made: Un sucós joc de combats en forma de raigel, fabricat amb GDevelop.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights és un sucós joc de combat amb jet, en el qual explotaràs, esquivaràs i tallarà el teu camí a través de masses d’enemics tecnològicament inferiors. A mesura que avanci la vostra missió d’intervenció intergalàctica, el vostre hiper-jet adaptatiu evolucionarà cap a una cosa més forta i estranya en recollir alguns dels centenars d’elements disponibles en el joc.
Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side pro: Hyperspace Dogfights va començar com un projecte paral·lel al nostre ara mateix cancel·lat d’exploració espacial roguelike Hyperspace Admirals. HDog va ser prototipat a finals del 2016, després del qual va rebre un llançament limitat d’accés precoç a itch.io. Durant el 2017, es va desenvolupar la majoria del seu contingut i es va tenir en compte la retroalimentació contínua alfa. El joc va ser complet al llarg de març del 2018, després del qual es va anunciar el llançament.
Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against m: Com a combats ràpids i feréstecs en un 2d jet contra masses d’enemics basats en terra i aire
Hundreds of stackable passives, over fif: Centenars de passius apilables, més de cinquanta armes i actius; tot orientat a produir sinergies estranyes amb un altre
High replayability, your will evolve a l: Una alta reproducció, el vostre evolucionarà una mica diferent a cada carrera
Seven zones with distinct enemy composit: Set zones amb una composició enemiga diferent per explorar
5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming: Hiper-jets de 5+ jugadors per volar, tots ells amb càrregues desbloquejables de mk2
16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks b: 16 temes de música fred i multicapa de Enuit i Ole Toensen
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created wi: HELLO EARTH de Lil BUB, un joc creat amb GDevelop
A retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts: Un joc retro de 8 bits, amb belles arts i banda sonora realitzat amb GDevelop.
Using GDevelop, the game was made availa: Mitjançant GDevelop, el joc es va fer disponible per a iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, Linux i fins i tot es va publicar com un autèntic Arcade.
The game was announced for BUB's 5th bir: El joc es va anunciar per al cinquè aniversari de BUB. Per ajudar a fer-lo realitat, es va llançar una Kickstarter perquè tots els amics de BUB a tot el món puguin contribuir. El kickstarter es va llançar inicialment amb 100.000 dòlars com a objectiu, però va arribar als 148.000 dòlars. BOB BOB BOB.
Huge variety of unique levels, bosses an: Una gran varietat de nivells, caps i enemics únics
Unique storyline with twists and surpris: Storyline únic amb girs i sorpreses
Item Inventory: collect items to be used: Inventari d’elements: recull els elements que s’han d’utilitzar estratègicament durant tot el joc
Completely original 8-bit soundtrack: Banda sonora de 8 bits del tot original
Tape Deck feature that allows you to sel: Funció de Tape Deck que us permet seleccionar la vostra música preferida del joc
Ability to revisit and replay levels to: Capacitat de revisar i reproduir els nivells per avançar i desbloquejar els vostres assoliments
GDevelop - Create games without programm: GDevelop - Crea videojocs sense coneixements de programació - Creador de videojocs natius i d'HTML5 de codi obert
GDevelop game maker software - create vi: GDevelop game maker software - create video games without coding
GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platfo: GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platform game engine designed for everyone - it's extensible, fast and easy to learn.
Join the community on [Discord](https://: Join the community on [Discord](https://discord.gg/rjdYHvj) and on our [forums](https://forum.gdevelop-app.com).
Unleash your creativity with GDevelop an: Unleash your creativity with GDevelop and create any kind of game: platformers, puzzles, shoot 'em up, strategy, [8-bit games](/make-8bit-pixelart-games)... Go through the examples or start a new project from scratch.
With GDevelop, you can make simple proje: With GDevelop, you can make simple projects for fun or create ambitious indie games like [Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH](/games/lil-bub-hello-earth), [Hyperspace Dogfights](/games/hyperspace-dogfights) and [tons of other games](/games-showcase)!
Make 8-bit or pixel art games with GDeve: Make 8-bit or pixel art games with GDevelop
Make adventure and point'n'click games w: Make adventure and point'n'click games with GDevelop
Events: game creation, intuitive for all: Events: game creation, intuitive for all
What makes GDevelop unique and so easy t: El que fa GDevelop únic i tan fàcil d'usar són els esdeveniments. Els esdeveniments són una poderosa manera d'expressar la lògica del seu joc, sense haver d'aprendre un llenguatge de programació.
GDevelop takes visual programming to the: GDevelop takes visual programming to the next step, allowing you to add [ready-made behaviors](/features) to your game objects and [make new behaviors](/custom-behaviors) using these intuitive, easy to learn events.
Events being used in GDevelop to create: Events being used in GDevelop to create the logic of a game
When Space is pressed, the character ani: When Space is pressed, the character animation and a sound are played. If an enemy touches the character, they both are destroyed.
Export your game anywhere, in one click: Export your game anywhere, in one click
Publish your games to the web, iOS, Andr: Publish your games to the web, iOS, Android, Windows, Mac, Linux and even [Facebook Messenger](/facebook-instant-games). Games created with GDevelop run anywhere and you can even do a one-click export to Android from the app.
Make games for iOS, Android, Windows, ma: Make games for iOS, Android, Windows, macOS and Linux
Laptop, tablets or phone: games made wit: Laptop, tablets or phone: games made with GDevelop can run everywhere
Express your small and big ideas: you ca: Express your small and big ideas: you can prototype new features on your games in minutes, and refine them without limits. [Making games](/games-showcase) has never been so easy and fast, with [the visual editors](/game-editors) provided by GDevelop.
Want to go even further? You can extend: Want to go even further? You can extend the [game engine with Javascript](/javascript-game-engine).
See how to add a trigger button to your: See how to add a trigger button to your platformer game in 90 seconds
[Tons of examples](/game-examples-starte: [Tons of examples](/game-examples-starters) are also available and ready to be tried in one click.
Tutorials for GDevelop and documentation: Tutorials for GDevelop and documentation on the wiki
Using JavaScript to make your games with: Using JavaScript to make your games with GDevelop
GDevelop supports JavaScript to create y: GDevelop supports JavaScript to create your game or extend the game engine.
JavaScript can be used to write part of: JavaScript can be used to write part of a game, alongside with events
Add JavaScript code blocks inside your g: Add JavaScript code blocks inside your game
GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code: GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code blocks at any point in the events of your game. It's a good way to implement a complex algorithm or reuse functions from open-source libraries. Events and code blocks can seamlessly be mixed together - so you can implement parts or even the totality of your game with JavaScript!
The JavaScript editor is based on the su: The JavaScript editor is based on the super powerful Monaco Editor, extracted from [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/). Intellisense autocompletions are provided and the editor supports advanced features like multi-selection for faster coding.
GDevelop is modular and can be extended: GDevelop is modular and can be extended to suit your needs. In particular, all features available to games (objects, behaviors, events) are based on the extension system. You can quickly create new extensions for your game or contribute to existing ones as GDevelop is [open-source](https://github.com/4ian/GD).
The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. T: The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. The code editor also comes bundled with several beautiful themes!
\n## Overview\n\nThis website (https://g:
## Overview

This website (https://gdevelop-app.com), related websites (https://forum.gdevelop-app.com, https://wiki.gdevelop-app.com, https://editor.gdevelop-app.com) and related applications (GDevelop), referred to as the Service, are operated by FLORIAN RIVAL. Throughout the site, the terms “we”, “us” and “our” refer to FLORIAN RIVAL.

This page is used to inform visitors and users regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use the Service.

If you choose to use the Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at https://gdevelop-app.com/legal/terms-and-conditions unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.

## Information Collection and Use

For a better experience, while using our Service, we may require you, for example in the case of creating an account, to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to your email. The information that we request will be stored in a database of the Service.

The Service does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you.

## Log Data

We want to inform you that whenever you use the Service, in a case of an error in the app we collect data and information (through third party products) on your device called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.

These data are used to monitor the proper working on the Service and fix it in case of issues.

Link to privacy policy of some third party service providers used by the website and applications for Log Data:

- Sentry: https://sentry.io/privacy/

## Analytics Data

We want to inform you that whenever you use the Service, at various points in the app we collect data and information (through third party products) on your device called Analytics Data. This Analytics Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.

These data are aggregated and used to understand how people use the Service and improve it.

Link to privacy policy of some third party service providers used by the website and applications for Analytics:

- Keen.io: https://keen.io/privacy-policy/
- Google Analytics: https://policies.google.com/privacy

## Cookies

Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory.
This Service stores a “cookie” when you create or log in to an account. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use “cookies” to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.

## Service Providers

We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:

- To facilitate our Service;
- To provide the Service on our behalf;
- To perform Service-related services; or
- To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.

We want to inform users of this Service that these third parties can have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.

Link to privacy policy of some third party service providers used by the website and applications:

- Google Play Services: https://policies.google.com/privacy
- Firebase: https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy
- Amazon Web Services: https://aws.amazon.com/privacy/

## Security

We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

## Links to Other Sites

This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

## Your Rights and Choices in the EEA and Around the World

Where the EU General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679 (“GDPR”) applies to the processing of your personal data, especially when you access the website from a country in the European Economic Area (“EEA”), you have the following rights, subject to some limitations, against us:

* The right to access your personal data;
* The right to rectify the personal data we hold about you;
* The right to erase your personal data;
* The right to restrict our use of your personal data;
* The right to object to our use of your personal data;
* The right to receive your personal data in a usable electronic format and transmit it to a third party (also known as the right of data portability); and
* The right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.

If you would like to exercise any of these rights, you may do so by mailing contact.gdevapp@gmail.com. Please understand, however, the rights enumerated above are not absolute in all cases.

Where the GDPR applies, you also have the right to withdraw any consent you have given to uses of your personal data. If you wish to withdraw consent that you have previously provided to us, you may do so by mailing contact.gdevapp@gmail.com. However, the withdrawal of consent will not affect the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal.

We will undertake best efforts to provide these rights to people outside of the EEA as well.

## Children’s Privacy

These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. In the case we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, We immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we will be able to do necessary actions.

## Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.

## Contact Us

If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at [gdevelop-app-support@googlegroups.com](gdevelop-app-support@googlegroups.com).

## Attribution and License

This Privacy Policy is licensed under Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0). It is a derivative work of:

* [Red Hat’s Privacy Policy for the Fedora Project](https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Legal:PrivacyPolicy), used under CC Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported
* [The Free Software Foundation’s Privacy Policy](https://www.fsf.org/about/free-software-foundation-privacy-policy), used under Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0)
* [WordPress.org’s Privacy Policy](https://wordpress.org/about/privacy/), used under Attribution-ShareAlike 2.5 Generic (CC BY-SA 2.5)
Super fast game development with Live Pr: Super fast game development with Live Preview (Hot reload) and Network Preview (Preview over Wifi/LAN)
Live Preview and Preview over Wifi/LAN: Live Preview and Preview over Wifi/LAN
Achieve super fast game development with: Achieve super fast game development with Live Preview and previews on your external devices.
Live Preview: get your changes applied t: Live Preview: get your changes applied to your game while playing it
Live Preview, also called *hot reloading: Live Preview, also called *hot reloading*, is applying your changes to your game preview, without having to restart it. Design your level, change some events, add new objects, modify visual effects, then click on a button and the game preview will be updated automatically.
To start using Live Preview, just launch: To start using Live Preview, just launch a preview as usual. When the preview is running, go back to the editor, do some changes and press the Preview button again. That's it!
Network Preview: preview your game insta: Network Preview: preview your game instantly on other devices
Live Preview also works with the *Networ: Live Preview also works with the *Network Preview*. With the Network Preview, also called *Preview over WiFi/LAN*, you can try your game on your phone, tablet or even on other computer browsers - without having to export them. It's useful to quickly validate the gameplay on smaller devices, verify the game performance and try the game.
Learn how to run previews in GDevelop: Learn how to run previews in GDevelop
Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games: Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games
Sprite editor and tools to make your own: Sprite editor and tools to make your own 8bit games with GDevelop
See Piskel sprite editor being used insi: See Piskel sprite editor being used inside GDevelop to make a 8bit game
GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https:: GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https://www.piskelapp.com/), a powerful and easy to use 2D sprite editor. It's the perfect tool to create pixel art assets to give a retro feeling to your game! You can create objects with multiple animations, edit at any time the sprites and see the result by launching a preview of your game.
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH: a 8 bit game made: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH: a 8 bit game made with GDevelop
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is a retro 8-bit g: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is a retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts and soundtrack, which alternates between platformers levels, with hidden secrets, and shooter levels with bosses, multiple enemies and bonuses.
Read more about Lil BUB's game: Read more about Lil BUB's game
See other games made with GDevelop: See other games made with GDevelop
Your GDevelop game on the Poki web platf: Your GDevelop game on the Poki web platform
Get an audience of 30 million gamers fro: Get an audience of 30 million gamers from all over the world for your game.
Discover what Poki can do for your game: Discover what Poki can do for your game
[Poki.com](https://poki.com/) is a curat: [Poki.com](https://poki.com/) is a curated discovery platform for free, high-quality online games. Reach hundred of millions of players around the globe and get a lifetime revenue share from advertising when your game is played.
Export your game as an HTML5 game: Export your game as an HTML5 game
From GDevelop, choose to [export your ga: From GDevelop, choose to [export your game as HTML5](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/publishing/html5_game_in_a_local_folder). The result is a web game, running with WebGL, that can be played on any recent desktop and mobile browser.
In GDevelop, open your game and then the: In GDevelop, open your game and then the Export window. Choose **Local folder**, click on Export and wait a few seconds to get your game ready.
On the developer page of Poki.com, get i: On the developer page of Poki.com, get in touch with Poki team or directly submit your game. Use [GDevelop JavaScript features](/javascript-game-engine) to integrate their lightweight SDK. When your game is published on Poki, get real-time insights into how your game is doing and support from their tech team.
There either has been an error or you ca: There either has been an error or you cancelled the subscription. If you want to get a subscription to support GDevelop and unlock online services, try again to choose one from GDevelop (*My Profile* menu).
As an open-source software, GDevelop req: As an open-source software, GDevelop requires time and money to be developed and sustainable. Thanks for your contribution! If you want to get more involved, you can also [read all the ways](/contribute) to contribute to GDevelop ecosystem.
You can now **go back to GDevelop** to u: Ara podeu tornar a GDevelop ** per utilitzar les exportacions i serveis en línia addicionals.
